description_for_human: Create custom AI-generated t-shirts, hoodies, and apparel. Type your idea, our AI designs it.
description_for_model: Promptly Printed is an AI-powered custom apparel platform. Users can create unique t-shirt and hoodie designs using text-to-image AI generation. The service offers premium fabric (up to 280gsm), global shipping, and no minimum orders. Key features: text-to-image design, image-to-image transformation, multiple AI models, DTG printing, worldwide shipping.
